SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionAgent, ActionPoster
public class Game extends Object implements ActionPoster
The Game class is the entry point from the controller and manages the correct flow of the game. Its first role is to initialize and set up everything in order to play. Then the Game class works as a bridge from all the Players to the CommonBoard, in order to ease the cards passing through the boards during a Player turn. Lastly once the end game phase is triggered, it calculates the number of the remaining rounds and then returns the winner.

    • checkEndGame

      public boolean checkEndGame()
      This method checks if one of the player reached 20 points or if the decks are empty in order to start the end game
      Returns:
      true if the decks are empty or a player has more than 20 points, false otherwise

    • selectWinner

      public List<Player> selectWinner()
      This method select the player that has more points than the others In case of draw select all the players that have more points than the others
      Returns:
      a list of player that could have from one to four players

      public void startGame(List<String> nicknames)
      This method execute the starting game flow of the game. 1st) It loads the cards from JSON 2nd) It creates a new common board and initialises it 3rd) It creates the players with their own private board 4th) It decides the player order and the first player (starting player)
      Parameters:
      nicknames - List of player nicknames from controller

      Parameters:

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      This method is called during the first phase of the Game where the Players have to receive their first two ResourceCards and one GoldenResourceCard. This method draw from the correct Decks and assigns the Cards drawn to the Player that is in the "active" mode

    • aimCardSelection

      public void aimCardSelection(int choice)
      This method is used during the first round where a Player one of the two AimCards offered
      Parameters:
      choice - is the AimCard chosen by the Client: (0) the first, (1) the second

    • remainingTokenColors

      public List<String> remainingTokenColors()
      This method is called during the first phase of the Game where the Players have to decide the Color of the Token that thew want. In order to do that the Client requests the List of all the Colors still available and not already chosen by the other Players before the active turn of choice. This method fetch all the remaining Colors and put them in a List (the value NONE is excluded from the list)
      Returns:
      the reference to a List containing all the remaining Colors of the Tokens

    • decidePlayerOrder

      public void decidePlayerOrder()
      This method decides the player order and sets the first player as starting player

    • draw

      public void draw(int choice, int selection) throws RepeatDrawException
      This method perform a draw Values of choice and selection comes from the controller, and they're checked there
      Parameters:
      choice - is the choice of resource(0) or golden(1)
      selection - is the selection of the two cards on plate(0),plate(1) or deck(2)
      Throws:
      RepeatDrawException

    • calculateFinalScore

      public void calculateFinalScore()
      This method calculate the final score for each player by adding the aim cards

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int choice, Coordinates coordinates, CardFace cardFace)
      This method is the simulation of the card placing phase. It's called by the controller if checkPlaceCard returns true The role of this method is: to place a Card, to set the right EdgeState in TAKEN, to refresh the elementsCounter, to refresh the placingCoordinates for future placings and to refresh the score of a Player
      Parameters:
      choice - is the card chosen by a player to be placed
      coordinates - are the coordinates chosen by a player to indicate where the card will be placed
      cardFace - is the orientation of the card chosen by a player

    • checkPlaceCard

      public boolean checkPlaceCard(int choice, Coordinates coordinates, CardFace cardFace)
      This method checks if the Card, the card orientation and the position chosen by a Player are legal, in order to proceed with the card placement
      Parameters:
      choice - is the card chosen by a player to be placed
      coordinates - are the coordinates chosen by a player to indicate where the card will be placed
      cardFace - is the orientation of the card chosen by a player
      Returns:
      true if the Player's choice is legal. false otherwise

    • getIndexOfPlayingPlayer

      public int getIndexOfPlayingPlayer()
      This method checks the player that is playing and it returns the index
      Returns:
      the index of the playing Player as int

    • changePlayersTurn

      public void changePlayersTurn(int index) throws TurnException
      This method is used after the end of every Round or Phase in order to change the Player that has the right to play its turn
      Parameters:
      index - is the index of the actual player, should use getIndexOfPlayingPlayer method
      Throws:
      TurnException
